41 static const std::string WALLET_ENDPOINT_BASE = "/wallet/";
42 
43 bool GetWalletNameFromJSONRPCRequest(const JSONRPCRequest& request, std::string& wallet_name)
44 {
45  if (request.URI.substr(0, WALLET_ENDPOINT_BASE.size()) == WALLET_ENDPOINT_BASE) {
46  // wallet endpoint was used
47  wallet_name = urlDecode(request.URI.substr(WALLET_ENDPOINT_BASE.size()));
48  return true;
49  }
50  return false;
51 }
52 
53 std::shared_ptr<CWallet> GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
54 {
55  std::string wallet_name;
56  if (GetWalletNameFromJSONRPCRequest(request, wallet_name)) {
57  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> pwallet = GetWallet(wallet_name);
58  if (!pwallet) throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_NOT_FOUND, "Requested wallet does not exist or is not loaded");
59  return pwallet;
60  }
61 
62  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<CWallet>> wallets = GetWallets();
63  return wallets.size() == 1 || (request.fHelp && wallets.size() > 0) ? wallets[0] : nullptr;
64 }

66 std::string HelpRequiringPassphrase(CWallet * const pwallet)
67 {
68  return pwallet && pwallet->IsCrypted()
69  ? "\nRequires wallet passphrase to be set with walletpassphrase call."
70  : "";

73 bool EnsureWalletIsAvailable(CWallet * const pwallet, bool avoidException)
74 {
75  if (pwallet) return true;
76  if (avoidException) return false;
77  if (!HasWallets()) {
78  throw JSONRPCError(
79  RPC_METHOD_NOT_FOUND, "Method not found (wallet method is disabled because no wallet is loaded)");
80  }
81  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_NOT_SPECIFIED,
82  "Wallet file not specified (must request wallet RPC through /wallet/<filename> uri-path).");
83 }

87  if (pwallet->IsLocked()) {

89  }

92 static void WalletTxToJSON(const CWalletTx& wtx, UniValue& entry)
93 {
94  int confirms = wtx.GetDepthInMainChain();
95  entry.pushKV("confirmations", confirms);
96  if (wtx.IsCoinBase())
97  entry.pushKV("generated", true);
98  if (confirms > 0)
99  {
100  entry.pushKV("blockhash", wtx.hashBlock.GetHex());
101  entry.pushKV("blockindex", wtx.nIndex);
102  entry.pushKV("blocktime", LookupBlockIndex(wtx.hashBlock)->GetBlockTime());
103  } else {
104  entry.pushKV("trusted", wtx.IsTrusted());
105  }
106  uint256 hash = wtx.GetHash();
107  entry.pushKV("txid", hash.GetHex());
108  UniValue conflicts(UniValue::VARR);
109  for (const uint256& conflict : wtx.GetConflicts())
110  conflicts.push_back(conflict.GetHex());
111  entry.pushKV("walletconflicts", conflicts);
112  entry.pushKV("time", wtx.GetTxTime());
113  entry.pushKV("timereceived", (int64_t)wtx.nTimeReceived);
114 
115  // Add opt-in RBF status
116  std::string rbfStatus = "no";
117  if (confirms <= 0) {
118  LOCK(mempool.cs);
119  RBFTransactionState rbfState = IsRBFOptIn(*wtx.tx, mempool);
120  if (rbfState == RBFTransactionState::UNKNOWN)
121  rbfStatus = "unknown";
122  else if (rbfState == RBFTransactionState::REPLACEABLE_BIP125)
123  rbfStatus = "yes";
124  }
125  entry.pushKV("bip125-replaceable", rbfStatus);
126 
127  for (const std::pair<const std::string, std::string>& item : wtx.mapValue)
128  entry.pushKV(item.first, item.second);
129 }

131 static std::string LabelFromValue(const UniValue& value)
132 {
133  std::string label = value.get_str();
134  if (label == "*")
135  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_INVALID_LABEL_NAME, "Invalid label name");
136  return label;
137 }

139 static UniValue getnewaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
140 {
141  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
142  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
143 
144  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
145  return NullUniValue;
146  }
147 
148  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() > 2)
149  throw std::runtime_error(
150  "getnewaddress ( \"label\" \"address_type\" )\n"
151  "\nReturns a new Bitcoin address for receiving payments.\n"
152  "If 'label' is specified, it is added to the address book \n"
153  "so payments received with the address will be associated with 'label'.\n"
154  "\nArguments:\n"
155  "1. \"label\" (string, optional) The label name for the address to be linked to. If not provided, the default label \"\" is used. It can also be set to the empty string \"\" to represent the default label. The label does not need to exist, it will be created if there is no label by the given name.\n"
156  "2. \"address_type\" (string, optional) The address type to use. Options are \"legacy\", \"p2sh-segwit\", and \"bech32\". Default is set by -addresstype.\n"
157  "\nResult:\n"
158  "\"address\" (string) The new bitcoin address\n"
159  "\nExamples:\n"
160  + HelpExampleCli("getnewaddress", "")
161  + HelpExampleRpc("getnewaddress", "")
162  );
163 
164  if (pwallet->IsWalletFlagSet(WALLET_FLAG_DISABLE_PRIVATE_KEYS)) {
165  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "Error: Private keys are disabled for this wallet");
166  }
167 
168  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
169 
170  // Parse the label first so we don't generate a key if there's an error
171  std::string label;
172  if (!request.params[0].isNull())
173  label = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
174 
175  OutputType output_type = pwallet->m_default_address_type;
176  if (!request.params[1].isNull()) {
177  if (!ParseOutputType(request.params[1].get_str(), output_type)) {
178  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, strprintf("Unknown address type '%s'", request.params[1].get_str()));
179  }
180  }
181 
182  if (!pwallet->IsLocked()) {
183  pwallet->TopUpKeyPool();
184  }
185 
186  // Generate a new key that is added to wallet
187  CPubKey newKey;
188  if (!pwallet->GetKeyFromPool(newKey)) {
189  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_KEYPOOL_RAN_OUT, "Error: Keypool ran out, please call keypoolrefill first");
190  }
191  pwallet->LearnRelatedScripts(newKey, output_type);
192  CTxDestination dest = GetDestinationForKey(newKey, output_type);
193 
194  pwallet->SetAddressBook(dest, label, "receive");
195 
196  return EncodeDestination(dest);
197 }
198 
199 CTxDestination GetLabelDestination(CWallet* const pwallet, const std::string& label, bool bForceNew=false)
200 {
201  CTxDestination dest;
202  if (!pwallet->GetLabelDestination(dest, label, bForceNew)) {
203  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_KEYPOOL_RAN_OUT, "Error: Keypool ran out, please call keypoolrefill first");
204  }
205 
206  return dest;
207 }

223  }

241 
242  // Parse the account first so we don't generate a key if there's an error
243  std::string account = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
244 
245  UniValue ret(UniValue::VSTR);
246 
247  ret = EncodeDestination(GetLabelDestination(pwallet, account));
248  return ret;
249 }

252 static UniValue getrawchangeaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
253 {
254  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
255  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
256 
257  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
258  return NullUniValue;
259  }
260 
261  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() > 1)
262  throw std::runtime_error(
263  "getrawchangeaddress ( \"address_type\" )\n"
264  "\nReturns a new Bitcoin address, for receiving change.\n"
265  "This is for use with raw transactions, NOT normal use.\n"
266  "\nArguments:\n"
267  "1. \"address_type\" (string, optional) The address type to use. Options are \"legacy\", \"p2sh-segwit\", and \"bech32\". Default is set by -changetype.\n"
268  "\nResult:\n"
269  "\"address\" (string) The address\n"
270  "\nExamples:\n"
271  + HelpExampleCli("getrawchangeaddress", "")
272  + HelpExampleRpc("getrawchangeaddress", "")
273  );
274 
275  if (pwallet->IsWalletFlagSet(WALLET_FLAG_DISABLE_PRIVATE_KEYS)) {
276  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "Error: Private keys are disabled for this wallet");
277  }
278 
279  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
280 
281  if (!pwallet->IsLocked()) {
282  pwallet->TopUpKeyPool();
283  }
284 
285  OutputType output_type = pwallet->m_default_change_type != OutputType::CHANGE_AUTO ? pwallet->m_default_change_type : pwallet->m_default_address_type;
286  if (!request.params[0].isNull()) {
287  if (!ParseOutputType(request.params[0].get_str(), output_type)) {
288  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, strprintf("Unknown address type '%s'", request.params[0].get_str()));
289  }
290  }
291 
292  CReserveKey reservekey(pwallet);
293  CPubKey vchPubKey;
294  if (!reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey, true))
295  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_KEYPOOL_RAN_OUT, "Error: Keypool ran out, please call keypoolrefill first");
296 
297  reservekey.KeepKey();
298 
299  pwallet->LearnRelatedScripts(vchPubKey, output_type);
300  CTxDestination dest = GetDestinationForKey(vchPubKey, output_type);
301 
302  return EncodeDestination(dest);
303 }

306 static UniValue setlabel(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
307 {
308  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
309  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
310 
311  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
312  return NullUniValue;
313  }
314 
315  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && request.strMethod == "setaccount") {
316  if (request.fHelp) {
317  throw std::runtime_error("setaccount (Deprecated, will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts)");
318  }
319  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "setaccount is deprecated and will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts.");
320  }
321 
322  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() != 2)
323  throw std::runtime_error(
324  "setlabel \"address\" \"label\"\n"
325  "\nSets the label associated with the given address.\n"
326  "\nArguments:\n"
327  "1. \"address\" (string, required) The bitcoin address to be associated with a label.\n"
328  "2. \"label\" (string, required) The label to assign to the address.\n"
329  "\nExamples:\n"
330  + HelpExampleCli("setlabel", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\" \"tabby\"")
331  + HelpExampleRpc("setlabel", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\", \"tabby\"")
332  );
333 
334  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
335 
336  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(request.params[0].get_str());
337  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
338  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Invalid Bitcoin address");
339  }
340 
341  std::string old_label = pwallet->mapAddressBook[dest].name;
342  std::string label = LabelFromValue(request.params[1]);
343 
344  if (IsMine(*pwallet, dest)) {
345  pwallet->SetAddressBook(dest, label, "receive");
346  if (request.strMethod == "setaccount" && old_label != label && dest == GetLabelDestination(pwallet, old_label)) {
347  // for setaccount, call GetLabelDestination so a new receive address is created for the old account
348  GetLabelDestination(pwallet, old_label, true);
349  }
350  } else {
351  pwallet->SetAddressBook(dest, label, "send");
352  }
353 
354  // Detect when there are no addresses using this label.
355  // If so, delete the account record for it. Labels, unlike addresses, can be deleted,
356  // and if we wouldn't do this, the record would stick around forever.
357  bool found_address = false;
358  for (const std::pair<const CTxDestination, CAddressBookData>& item : pwallet->mapAddressBook) {
359  if (item.second.name == label) {
360  found_address = true;
361  break;
362  }
363  }
364  if (!found_address) {
365  pwallet->DeleteLabel(old_label);
366  }
367 
368  return NullUniValue;
369 }

372 static UniValue getaccount(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
373 {
374  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
375  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
376 
377  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
378  return NullUniValue;
379  }
380 
381  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
382  if (request.fHelp) {
383  throw std::runtime_error("getaccount (Deprecated, will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts)");
384  }
385  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "getaccount is deprecated and will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts.");
386  }
387 
388  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() != 1)
389  throw std::runtime_error(
390  "getaccount \"address\"\n"
391  "\nDEPRECATED. Returns the account associated with the given address.\n"
392  "\nArguments:\n"
393  "1. \"address\" (string, required) The bitcoin address for account lookup.\n"
394  "\nResult:\n"
395  "\"accountname\" (string) the account address\n"
396  "\nExamples:\n"
397  + HelpExampleCli("getaccount", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\"")
398  + HelpExampleRpc("getaccount", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\"")
399  );
400 
401  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
402 
403  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(request.params[0].get_str());
404  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
405  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Invalid Bitcoin address");
406  }
407 
408  std::string strAccount;
409  std::map<CTxDestination, CAddressBookData>::iterator mi = pwallet->mapAddressBook.find(dest);
410  if (mi != pwallet->mapAddressBook.end() && !(*mi).second.name.empty()) {
411  strAccount = (*mi).second.name;
412  }
413  return strAccount;
414 }

417 static UniValue getaddressesbyaccount(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
418 {
419  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
420  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
421 
422  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
423  return NullUniValue;
424  }
425 
426  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
427  if (request.fHelp) {
428  throw std::runtime_error("getaddressbyaccount (Deprecated, will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts)");
429  }
430  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "getaddressesbyaccount is deprecated and will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts.");
431  }
432 
433  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() != 1)
434  throw std::runtime_error(
435  "getaddressesbyaccount \"account\"\n"
436  "\nDEPRECATED. Returns the list of addresses for the given account.\n"
437  "\nArguments:\n"
438  "1. \"account\" (string, required) The account name.\n"
439  "\nResult:\n"
440  "[ (json array of string)\n"
441  " \"address\" (string) a bitcoin address associated with the given account\n"
442  " ,...\n"
443  "]\n"
444  "\nExamples:\n"
445  + HelpExampleCli("getaddressesbyaccount", "\"tabby\"")
446  + HelpExampleRpc("getaddressesbyaccount", "\"tabby\"")
447  );
448 
449  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
450 
451  std::string strAccount = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
452 
453  // Find all addresses that have the given account
454  UniValue ret(UniValue::VARR);
455  for (const std::pair<const CTxDestination, CAddressBookData>& item : pwallet->mapAddressBook) {
456  const CTxDestination& dest = item.first;
457  const std::string& strName = item.second.name;
458  if (strName == strAccount) {
459  ret.push_back(EncodeDestination(dest));
460  }
461  }
462  return ret;
463 }

465 static CTransactionRef SendMoney(CWallet * const pwallet, const CTxDestination &address, CAmount nValue, bool fSubtractFeeFromAmount, const CCoinControl& coin_control, mapValue_t mapValue, std::string fromAccount)
466 {
467  CAmount curBalance = pwallet->GetBalance();
468 
469  // Check amount
470  if (nValue <= 0)
471  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Invalid amount");
472 
473  if (nValue > curBalance)
474  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, "Insufficient funds");
475 
476  if (pwallet->GetBroadcastTransactions() && !g_connman) {
477  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_CLIENT_P2P_DISABLED, "Error: Peer-to-peer functionality missing or disabled");
478  }
479 
480  // Parse Bitcoin address
481  CScript scriptPubKey = GetScriptForDestination(address);
482 
483  // Create and send the transaction
484  CReserveKey reservekey(pwallet);
485  CAmount nFeeRequired;
486  std::string strError;
487  std::vector<CRecipient> vecSend;
488  int nChangePosRet = -1;
489  CRecipient recipient = {scriptPubKey, nValue, fSubtractFeeFromAmount};
490  vecSend.push_back(recipient);
491  CTransactionRef tx;
492  if (!pwallet->CreateTransaction(vecSend, tx, reservekey, nFeeRequired, nChangePosRet, strError, coin_control)) {
493  if (!fSubtractFeeFromAmount && nValue + nFeeRequired > curBalance)
494  strError = strprintf("Error: This transaction requires a transaction fee of at least %s", FormatMoney(nFeeRequired));
495  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, strError);
496  }
497  CValidationState state;
498  if (!pwallet->CommitTransaction(tx, std::move(mapValue), {} /* orderForm */, std::move(fromAccount), reservekey, g_connman.get(), state)) {
499  strError = strprintf("Error: The transaction was rejected! Reason given: %s", FormatStateMessage(state));
500  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, strError);
501  }
502  return tx;
503 }

505 static UniValue sendtoaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
506 {
507  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
508  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
509 
510  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
511  return NullUniValue;
512  }
513 
514  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 2 || request.params.size() > 8)
515  throw std::runtime_error(
516  "sendtoaddress \"address\" amount ( \"comment\" \"comment_to\" subtractfeefromamount replaceable conf_target \"estimate_mode\")\n"
517  "\nSend an amount to a given address.\n"
518  + HelpRequiringPassphrase(pwallet) +
519  "\nArguments:\n"
520  "1. \"address\" (string, required) The bitcoin address to send to.\n"
521  "2. \"amount\" (numeric or string, required) The amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " to send. eg 0.1\n"
522  "3. \"comment\" (string, optional) A comment used to store what the transaction is for. \n"
523  " This is not part of the transaction, just kept in your wallet.\n"
524  "4. \"comment_to\" (string, optional) A comment to store the name of the person or organization \n"
525  " to which you're sending the transaction. This is not part of the \n"
526  " transaction, just kept in your wallet.\n"
527  "5. subtractfeefromamount (boolean, optional, default=false) The fee will be deducted from the amount being sent.\n"
528  " The recipient will receive less bitcoins than you enter in the amount field.\n"
529  "6. replaceable (boolean, optional) Allow this transaction to be replaced by a transaction with higher fees via BIP 125\n"
530  "7. conf_target (numeric, optional) Confirmation target (in blocks)\n"
531  "8. \"estimate_mode\" (string, optional, default=UNSET) The fee estimate mode, must be one of:\n"
532  " \"UNSET\"\n"
533  " \"ECONOMICAL\"\n"
534  " \"CONSERVATIVE\"\n"
535  "\nResult:\n"
536  "\"txid\" (string) The transaction id.\n"
537  "\nExamples:\n"
538  + HelpExampleCli("sendtoaddress", "\"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\" 0.1")
539  + HelpExampleCli("sendtoaddress", "\"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\" 0.1 \"donation\" \"seans outpost\"")
540  + HelpExampleCli("sendtoaddress", "\"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\" 0.1 \"\" \"\" true")
541  + HelpExampleRpc("sendtoaddress", "\"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\", 0.1, \"donation\", \"seans outpost\"")
542  );
543 
544  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
545  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
546  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
547 
548  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
549 
550  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(request.params[0].get_str());
551  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
552  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Invalid address");
553  }
554 
555  // Amount
556  CAmount nAmount = AmountFromValue(request.params[1]);
557  if (nAmount <= 0)
558  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_TYPE_ERROR, "Invalid amount for send");
559 
560  // Wallet comments
561  mapValue_t mapValue;
562  if (!request.params[2].isNull() && !request.params[2].get_str().empty())
563  mapValue["comment"] = request.params[2].get_str();
564  if (!request.params[3].isNull() && !request.params[3].get_str().empty())
565  mapValue["to"] = request.params[3].get_str();
566 
567  bool fSubtractFeeFromAmount = false;
568  if (!request.params[4].isNull()) {
569  fSubtractFeeFromAmount = request.params[4].get_bool();
570  }
571 
572  CCoinControl coin_control;
573  if (!request.params[5].isNull()) {
574  coin_control.m_signal_bip125_rbf = request.params[5].get_bool();
575  }
576 
577  if (!request.params[6].isNull()) {
578  coin_control.m_confirm_target = ParseConfirmTarget(request.params[6]);
579  }
580 
581  if (!request.params[7].isNull()) {
582  if (!FeeModeFromString(request.params[7].get_str(), coin_control.m_fee_mode)) {
583  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Invalid estimate_mode parameter");
584  }
585  }
586 
587 
588  EnsureWalletIsUnlocked(pwallet);
589 
590  CTransactionRef tx = SendMoney(pwallet, dest, nAmount, fSubtractFeeFromAmount, coin_control, std::move(mapValue), {} /* fromAccount */);
591  return tx->GetHash().GetHex();
592 }

594 static UniValue listaddressgroupings(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
595 {
596  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
597  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
598 
599  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
600  return NullUniValue;
601  }
602 
603  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() != 0)
604  throw std::runtime_error(
605  "listaddressgroupings\n"
606  "\nLists groups of addresses which have had their common ownership\n"
607  "made public by common use as inputs or as the resulting change\n"
608  "in past transactions\n"
609  "\nResult:\n"
610  "[\n"
611  " [\n"
612  " [\n"
613  " \"address\", (string) The bitcoin address\n"
614  " amount, (numeric) The amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + "\n"
615  " \"label\" (string, optional) The label\n"
616  " ]\n"
617  " ,...\n"
618  " ]\n"
619  " ,...\n"
620  "]\n"
621  "\nExamples:\n"
622  + HelpExampleCli("listaddressgroupings", "")
623  + HelpExampleRpc("listaddressgroupings", "")
624  );
625 
626  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
627  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
628  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
629 
630  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
631 
632  UniValue jsonGroupings(UniValue::VARR);
633  std::map<CTxDestination, CAmount> balances = pwallet->GetAddressBalances();
634  for (const std::set<CTxDestination>& grouping : pwallet->GetAddressGroupings()) {
635  UniValue jsonGrouping(UniValue::VARR);
636  for (const CTxDestination& address : grouping)
637  {
638  UniValue addressInfo(UniValue::VARR);
639  addressInfo.push_back(EncodeDestination(address));
640  addressInfo.push_back(ValueFromAmount(balances[address]));
641  {
642  if (pwallet->mapAddressBook.find(address) != pwallet->mapAddressBook.end()) {
643  addressInfo.push_back(pwallet->mapAddressBook.find(address)->second.name);
644  }
645  }
646  jsonGrouping.push_back(addressInfo);
647  }
648  jsonGroupings.push_back(jsonGrouping);
649  }
650  return jsonGroupings;
651 }

653 static UniValue signmessage(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
654 {
655  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
656  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
657 
658  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
659  return NullUniValue;
660  }
661 
662  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() != 2)
663  throw std::runtime_error(
664  "signmessage \"address\" \"message\"\n"
665  "\nSign a message with the private key of an address"
666  + HelpRequiringPassphrase(pwallet) + "\n"
667  "\nArguments:\n"
668  "1. \"address\" (string, required) The bitcoin address to use for the private key.\n"
669  "2. \"message\" (string, required) The message to create a signature of.\n"
670  "\nResult:\n"
671  "\"signature\" (string) The signature of the message encoded in base 64\n"
672  "\nExamples:\n"
673  "\nUnlock the wallet for 30 seconds\n"
674  + HelpExampleCli("walletpassphrase", "\"mypassphrase\" 30") +
675  "\nCreate the signature\n"
676  + HelpExampleCli("signmessage", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\" \"my message\"") +
677  "\nVerify the signature\n"
678  + HelpExampleCli("verifymessage", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\" \"signature\" \"my message\"") +
679  "\nAs json rpc\n"
680  + HelpExampleRpc("signmessage", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\", \"my message\"")
681  );
682 
683  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
684 
685  EnsureWalletIsUnlocked(pwallet);
686 
687  std::string strAddress = request.params[0].get_str();
688  std::string strMessage = request.params[1].get_str();
689 
690  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(strAddress);
691  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
692  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_TYPE_ERROR, "Invalid address");
693  }
694 
695  const CKeyID *keyID = boost::get<CKeyID>(&dest);
696  if (!keyID) {
697  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_TYPE_ERROR, "Address does not refer to key");
698  }
699 
700  CKey key;
701  if (!pwallet->GetKey(*keyID, key)) {
702  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "Private key not available");
703  }
704 
705  CHashWriter ss(SER_GETHASH, 0);
706  ss << strMessageMagic;
707  ss << strMessage;
708 
709  std::vector<unsigned char> vchSig;
710  if (!key.SignCompact(ss.GetHash(), vchSig))
711  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Sign failed");
712 
713  return EncodeBase64(vchSig.data(), vchSig.size());
714 }

716 static UniValue getreceivedbyaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
717 {
718  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
719  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
720 
721  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
722  return NullUniValue;
723  }
724 
725  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 1 || request.params.size() > 2)
726  throw std::runtime_error(
727  "getreceivedbyaddress \"address\" ( minconf )\n"
728  "\nReturns the total amount received by the given address in transactions with at least minconf confirmations.\n"
729  "\nArguments:\n"
730  "1. \"address\" (string, required) The bitcoin address for transactions.\n"
731  "2. minconf (numeric, optional, default=1) Only include transactions confirmed at least this many times.\n"
732  "\nResult:\n"
733  "amount (numeric) The total amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " received at this address.\n"
734  "\nExamples:\n"
735  "\nThe amount from transactions with at least 1 confirmation\n"
736  + HelpExampleCli("getreceivedbyaddress", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\"") +
737  "\nThe amount including unconfirmed transactions, zero confirmations\n"
738  + HelpExampleCli("getreceivedbyaddress", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\" 0") +
739  "\nThe amount with at least 6 confirmations\n"
740  + HelpExampleCli("getreceivedbyaddress", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\" 6") +
741  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
742  + HelpExampleRpc("getreceivedbyaddress", "\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\", 6")
743  );
744 
745  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
746  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
747  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
748 
749  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
750 
751  // Bitcoin address
752  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(request.params[0].get_str());
753  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
754  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Invalid Bitcoin address");
755  }
756  CScript scriptPubKey = GetScriptForDestination(dest);
757  if (!IsMine(*pwallet, scriptPubKey)) {
758  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "Address not found in wallet");
759  }
760 
761  // Minimum confirmations
762  int nMinDepth = 1;
763  if (!request.params[1].isNull())
764  nMinDepth = request.params[1].get_int();
765 
766  // Tally
767  CAmount nAmount = 0;
768  for (const std::pair<const uint256, CWalletTx>& pairWtx : pwallet->mapWallet) {
769  const CWalletTx& wtx = pairWtx.second;
770  if (wtx.IsCoinBase() || !CheckFinalTx(*wtx.tx))
771  continue;
772 
773  for (const CTxOut& txout : wtx.tx->vout)
774  if (txout.scriptPubKey == scriptPubKey)
775  if (wtx.GetDepthInMainChain() >= nMinDepth)
776  nAmount += txout.nValue;
777  }
778 
779  return ValueFromAmount(nAmount);
780 }

783 static UniValue getreceivedbylabel(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
784 {
785  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
786  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
787 
788  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
789  return NullUniValue;
790  }
791 
792  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && request.strMethod == "getreceivedbyaccount") {
793  if (request.fHelp) {
794  throw std::runtime_error("getreceivedbyaccount (Deprecated, will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts)");
795  }
796  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "getreceivedbyaccount is deprecated and will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts.");
797  }
798 
799  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 1 || request.params.size() > 2)
800  throw std::runtime_error(
801  "getreceivedbylabel \"label\" ( minconf )\n"
802  "\nReturns the total amount received by addresses with <label> in transactions with at least [minconf] confirmations.\n"
803  "\nArguments:\n"
804  "1. \"label\" (string, required) The selected label, may be the default label using \"\".\n"
805  "2. minconf (numeric, optional, default=1) Only include transactions confirmed at least this many times.\n"
806  "\nResult:\n"
807  "amount (numeric) The total amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " received for this label.\n"
808  "\nExamples:\n"
809  "\nAmount received by the default label with at least 1 confirmation\n"
810  + HelpExampleCli("getreceivedbylabel", "\"\"") +
811  "\nAmount received at the tabby label including unconfirmed amounts with zero confirmations\n"
812  + HelpExampleCli("getreceivedbylabel", "\"tabby\" 0") +
813  "\nThe amount with at least 6 confirmations\n"
814  + HelpExampleCli("getreceivedbylabel", "\"tabby\" 6") +
815  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
816  + HelpExampleRpc("getreceivedbylabel", "\"tabby\", 6")
817  );
818 
819  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
820  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
821  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
822 
823  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
824 
825  // Minimum confirmations
826  int nMinDepth = 1;
827  if (!request.params[1].isNull())
828  nMinDepth = request.params[1].get_int();
829 
830  // Get the set of pub keys assigned to label
831  std::string label = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
832  std::set<CTxDestination> setAddress = pwallet->GetLabelAddresses(label);
833 
834  // Tally
835  CAmount nAmount = 0;
836  for (const std::pair<const uint256, CWalletTx>& pairWtx : pwallet->mapWallet) {
837  const CWalletTx& wtx = pairWtx.second;
838  if (wtx.IsCoinBase() || !CheckFinalTx(*wtx.tx))
839  continue;
840 
841  for (const CTxOut& txout : wtx.tx->vout)
842  {
843  CTxDestination address;
844  if (ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, address) && IsMine(*pwallet, address) && setAddress.count(address)) {
845  if (wtx.GetDepthInMainChain() >= nMinDepth)
846  nAmount += txout.nValue;
847  }
848  }
849  }
850 
851  return ValueFromAmount(nAmount);
852 }

855 static UniValue getbalance(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
856 {
857  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
858  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
859 
860  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
861  return NullUniValue;
862  }
863 
864  if (request.fHelp || (request.params.size() > 3 ))
865  throw std::runtime_error(
866  (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") ? std::string(
867  "getbalance ( \"account\" minconf include_watchonly )\n"
868  "\nIf account is not specified, returns the server's total available balance.\n"
869  "The available balance is what the wallet considers currently spendable, and is\n"
870  "thus affected by options which limit spendability such as -spendzeroconfchange.\n"
871  "If account is specified (DEPRECATED), returns the balance in the account.\n"
872  "Note that the account \"\" is not the same as leaving the parameter out.\n"
873  "The server total may be different to the balance in the default \"\" account.\n"
874  "\nArguments:\n"
875  "1. \"account\" (string, optional) DEPRECATED. This argument will be removed in V0.18. \n"
876  " To use this deprecated argument, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts. The account string may be given as a\n"
877  " specific account name to find the balance associated with wallet keys in\n"
878  " a named account, or as the empty string (\"\") to find the balance\n"
879  " associated with wallet keys not in any named account, or as \"*\" to find\n"
880  " the balance associated with all wallet keys regardless of account.\n"
881  " When this option is specified, it calculates the balance in a different\n"
882  " way than when it is not specified, and which can count spends twice when\n"
883  " there are conflicting pending transactions (such as those created by\n"
884  " the bumpfee command), temporarily resulting in low or even negative\n"
885  " balances. In general, account balance calculation is not considered\n"
886  " reliable and has resulted in confusing outcomes, so it is recommended to\n"
887  " avoid passing this argument.\n"
888  "2. minconf (numeric, optional) Only include transactions confirmed at least this many times. \n"
889  " The default is 1 if an account is provided or 0 if no account is provided\n")
890  : std::string(
891  "getbalance ( \"(dummy)\" minconf include_watchonly )\n"
892  "\nReturns the total available balance.\n"
893  "The available balance is what the wallet considers currently spendable, and is\n"
894  "thus affected by options which limit spendability such as -spendzeroconfchange.\n"
895  "\nArguments:\n"
896  "1. (dummy) (string, optional) Remains for backward compatibility. Must be excluded or set to \"*\".\n"
897  "2. minconf (numeric, optional, default=0) Only include transactions confirmed at least this many times.\n")) +
898  "3. include_watchonly (bool, optional, default=false) Also include balance in watch-only addresses (see 'importaddress')\n"
899  "\nResult:\n"
900  "amount (numeric) The total amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " received for this account.\n"
901  "\nExamples:\n"
902  "\nThe total amount in the wallet with 1 or more confirmations\n"
903  + HelpExampleCli("getbalance", "") +
904  "\nThe total amount in the wallet at least 6 blocks confirmed\n"
905  + HelpExampleCli("getbalance", "\"*\" 6") +
906  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
907  + HelpExampleRpc("getbalance", "\"*\", 6")
908  );
909 
910  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
911  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
912  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
913 
914  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
915 
916  const UniValue& account_value = request.params[0];
917 
918  int min_depth = 0;
919  if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && !account_value.isNull()) {
920  // Default min_depth to 1 when an account is provided.
921  min_depth = 1;
922  }
923  if (!request.params[1].isNull()) {
924  min_depth = request.params[1].get_int();
925  }
926 
927  isminefilter filter = ISMINE_SPENDABLE;
928  if (!request.params[2].isNull() && request.params[2].get_bool()) {
929  filter = filter | ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY;
930  }
931 
932  if (!account_value.isNull()) {
933 
934  const std::string& account_param = account_value.get_str();
935  const std::string* account = account_param != "*" ? &account_param : nullptr;
936 
937  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && account_param != "*") {
938  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "dummy first argument must be excluded or set to \"*\".");
939  } else if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
940  return ValueFromAmount(pwallet->GetLegacyBalance(filter, min_depth, account));
941  }
942  }
943 
944  return ValueFromAmount(pwallet->GetBalance(filter, min_depth));
945 }

971 static UniValue movecmd(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
972 {
973  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
974  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
975 
976  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
977  return NullUniValue;
978  }
979 
980  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
981  if (request.fHelp) {
982  throw std::runtime_error("move (Deprecated, will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts)");
983  }
984  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "move is deprecated and will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts.");
985  }
986 
987  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 3 || request.params.size() > 5)
988  throw std::runtime_error(
989  "move \"fromaccount\" \"toaccount\" amount ( minconf \"comment\" )\n"
990  "\nDEPRECATED. Move a specified amount from one account in your wallet to another.\n"
991  "\nArguments:\n"
992  "1. \"fromaccount\" (string, required) The name of the account to move funds from. May be the default account using \"\".\n"
993  "2. \"toaccount\" (string, required) The name of the account to move funds to. May be the default account using \"\".\n"
994  "3. amount (numeric) Quantity of " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " to move between accounts.\n"
995  "4. (dummy) (numeric, optional) Ignored. Remains for backward compatibility.\n"
996  "5. \"comment\" (string, optional) An optional comment, stored in the wallet only.\n"
997  "\nResult:\n"
998  "true|false (boolean) true if successful.\n"
999  "\nExamples:\n"
1000  "\nMove 0.01 " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " from the default account to the account named tabby\n"
1001  + HelpExampleCli("move", "\"\" \"tabby\" 0.01") +
1002  "\nMove 0.01 " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " timotei to akiko with a comment and funds have 6 confirmations\n"
1003  + HelpExampleCli("move", "\"timotei\" \"akiko\" 0.01 6 \"happy birthday!\"") +
1004  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
1005  + HelpExampleRpc("move", "\"timotei\", \"akiko\", 0.01, 6, \"happy birthday!\"")
1006  );
1007 
1008  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
1009 
1010  std::string strFrom = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
1011  std::string strTo = LabelFromValue(request.params[1]);
1012  CAmount nAmount = AmountFromValue(request.params[2]);
1013  if (nAmount <= 0)
1014  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_TYPE_ERROR, "Invalid amount for send");
1015  if (!request.params[3].isNull())
1016  // unused parameter, used to be nMinDepth, keep type-checking it though
1017  (void)request.params[3].get_int();
1018  std::string strComment;
1019  if (!request.params[4].isNull())
1020  strComment = request.params[4].get_str();
1021 
1022  if (!pwallet->AccountMove(strFrom, strTo, nAmount, strComment)) {
1023  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_DATABASE_ERROR, "database error");
1024  }
1025 
1026  return true;
1027 }

1051  + HelpRequiringPassphrase(pwallet) + "\n"
1052  "\nArguments:\n"
1053  "1. \"fromaccount\" (string, required) The name of the account to send funds from. May be the default account using \"\".\n"
1054  " Specifying an account does not influence coin selection, but it does associate the newly created\n"
1055  " transaction with the account, so the account's balance computation and transaction history can reflect\n"
1056  " the spend.\n"
1057  "2. \"toaddress\" (string, required) The bitcoin address to send funds to.\n"
1058  "3. amount (numeric or string, required) The amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " (transaction fee is added on top).\n"
1059  "4. minconf (numeric, optional, default=1) Only use funds with at least this many confirmations.\n"
1060  "5. \"comment\" (string, optional) A comment used to store what the transaction is for. \n"
1061  " This is not part of the transaction, just kept in your wallet.\n"
1062  "6. \"comment_to\" (string, optional) An optional comment to store the name of the person or organization \n"
1063  " to which you're sending the transaction. This is not part of the transaction, \n"
1064  " it is just kept in your wallet.\n"
1065  "\nResult:\n"
1066  "\"txid\" (string) The transaction id.\n"
1067  "\nExamples:\n"
1068  "\nSend 0.01 " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " from the default account to the address, must have at least 1 confirmation\n"
1069  + HelpExampleCli("sendfrom", "\"\" \"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\" 0.01") +
1070  "\nSend 0.01 from the tabby account to the given address, funds must have at least 6 confirmations\n"
1071  + HelpExampleCli("sendfrom", "\"tabby\" \"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\" 0.01 6 \"donation\" \"seans outpost\"") +
1072  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
1073  + HelpExampleRpc("sendfrom", "\"tabby\", \"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\", 0.01, 6, \"donation\", \"seans outpost\"")
1074  );
1075 
1076  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
1077  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
1078  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
1079 
1080  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
1081 
1082  std::string strAccount = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
1083  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(request.params[1].get_str());
1084  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
1085  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Invalid Bitcoin address");
1086  }
1087  CAmount nAmount = AmountFromValue(request.params[2]);
1088  if (nAmount <= 0)
1089  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_TYPE_ERROR, "Invalid amount for send");
1090  int nMinDepth = 1;
1091  if (!request.params[3].isNull())
1092  nMinDepth = request.params[3].get_int();
1093 
1094  mapValue_t mapValue;
1095  if (!request.params[4].isNull() && !request.params[4].get_str().empty())
1096  mapValue["comment"] = request.params[4].get_str();
1097  if (!request.params[5].isNull() && !request.params[5].get_str().empty())
1098  mapValue["to"] = request.params[5].get_str();
1099 
1100  EnsureWalletIsUnlocked(pwallet);
1101 
1102  // Check funds
1103  CAmount nBalance = pwallet->GetLegacyBalance(ISMINE_SPENDABLE, nMinDepth, &strAccount);
1104  if (nAmount > nBalance)
1105  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, "Account has insufficient funds");
1106 
1107  CCoinControl no_coin_control; // This is a deprecated API
1108  CTransactionRef tx = SendMoney(pwallet, dest, nAmount, false, no_coin_control, std::move(mapValue), std::move(strAccount));
1109  return tx->GetHash().GetHex();
1110 }

1171  " {\n"
1172  " \"address\":amount (numeric or string) The bitcoin address is the key, the numeric amount (can be string) in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " is the value\n"

1176  "4. \"comment\" (string, optional) A comment\n"
1177  "5. subtractfeefrom (array, optional) A json array with addresses.\n"
1178  " The fee will be equally deducted from the amount of each selected address.\n"
1179  " Those recipients will receive less bitcoins than you enter in their corresponding amount field.\n"
1180  " If no addresses are specified here, the sender pays the fee.\n"
1181  " [\n"
1182  " \"address\" (string) Subtract fee from this address\n"
1183  " ,...\n"
1184  " ]\n"
1185  "6. replaceable (boolean, optional) Allow this transaction to be replaced by a transaction with higher fees via BIP 125\n"
1186  "7. conf_target (numeric, optional) Confirmation target (in blocks)\n"
1187  "8. \"estimate_mode\" (string, optional, default=UNSET) The fee estimate mode, must be one of:\n"
1188  " \"UNSET\"\n"
1189  " \"ECONOMICAL\"\n"
1190  " \"CONSERVATIVE\"\n"
1191  "\nResult:\n"
1192  "\"txid\" (string) The transaction id for the send. Only 1 transaction is created regardless of \n"
1193  " the number of addresses.\n"
1194  "\nExamples:\n"
1195  "\nSend two amounts to two different addresses:\n"
1196  + HelpExampleCli("sendmany", "\"\" \"{\\\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\\\":0.01,\\\"1353tsE8YMTA4EuV7dgUXGjNFf9KpVvKHz\\\":0.02}\"") +
1197  "\nSend two amounts to two different addresses setting the confirmation and comment:\n"
1198  + HelpExampleCli("sendmany", "\"\" \"{\\\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\\\":0.01,\\\"1353tsE8YMTA4EuV7dgUXGjNFf9KpVvKHz\\\":0.02}\" 6 \"testing\"") +
1199  "\nSend two amounts to two different addresses, subtract fee from amount:\n"
1200  + HelpExampleCli("sendmany", "\"\" \"{\\\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\\\":0.01,\\\"1353tsE8YMTA4EuV7dgUXGjNFf9KpVvKHz\\\":0.02}\" 1 \"\" \"[\\\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\\\",\\\"1353tsE8YMTA4EuV7dgUXGjNFf9KpVvKHz\\\"]\"") +
1201  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
1202  + HelpExampleRpc("sendmany", "\"\", {\"1D1ZrZNe3JUo7ZycKEYQQiQAWd9y54F4XX\":0.01,\"1353tsE8YMTA4EuV7dgUXGjNFf9KpVvKHz\":0.02}, 6, \"testing\"");
1203  }
1204 
1205  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 2 || request.params.size() > 8) throw std::runtime_error(help_text);
1206 
1207  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
1208  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
1209  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
1210 
1211  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
1212 
1213  if (pwallet->GetBroadcastTransactions() && !g_connman) {
1214  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_CLIENT_P2P_DISABLED, "Error: Peer-to-peer functionality missing or disabled");
1215  }
1216 
1217  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && !request.params[0].get_str().empty()) {
1218  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Dummy value must be set to \"\"");
1219  }
1220  std::string strAccount = LabelFromValue(request.params[0]);
1221  UniValue sendTo = request.params[1].get_obj();
1222  int nMinDepth = 1;
1223  if (!request.params[2].isNull())
1224  nMinDepth = request.params[2].get_int();
1225 
1226  mapValue_t mapValue;
1227  if (!request.params[3].isNull() && !request.params[3].get_str().empty())
1228  mapValue["comment"] = request.params[3].get_str();
1229 
1230  UniValue subtractFeeFromAmount(UniValue::VARR);
1231  if (!request.params[4].isNull())
1232  subtractFeeFromAmount = request.params[4].get_array();
1233 
1234  CCoinControl coin_control;
1235  if (!request.params[5].isNull()) {
1236  coin_control.m_signal_bip125_rbf = request.params[5].get_bool();
1237  }
1238 
1239  if (!request.params[6].isNull()) {
1240  coin_control.m_confirm_target = ParseConfirmTarget(request.params[6]);
1241  }
1242 
1243  if (!request.params[7].isNull()) {
1244  if (!FeeModeFromString(request.params[7].get_str(), coin_control.m_fee_mode)) {
1245  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Invalid estimate_mode parameter");
1246  }
1247  }
1248 
1249  std::set<CTxDestination> destinations;
1250  std::vector<CRecipient> vecSend;
1251 
1252  CAmount totalAmount = 0;
1253  std::vector<std::string> keys = sendTo.getKeys();
1254  for (const std::string& name_ : keys) {
1255  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(name_);
1256  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
1257  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, std::string("Invalid Bitcoin address: ") + name_);
1258  }
1259 
1260  if (destinations.count(dest)) {
1261  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, std::string("Invalid parameter, duplicated address: ") + name_);
1262  }
1263  destinations.insert(dest);
1264 
1265  CScript scriptPubKey = GetScriptForDestination(dest);
1266  CAmount nAmount = AmountFromValue(sendTo[name_]);
1267  if (nAmount <= 0)
1268  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_TYPE_ERROR, "Invalid amount for send");
1269  totalAmount += nAmount;
1270 
1271  bool fSubtractFeeFromAmount = false;
1272  for (unsigned int idx = 0; idx < subtractFeeFromAmount.size(); idx++) {
1273  const UniValue& addr = subtractFeeFromAmount[idx];
1274  if (addr.get_str() == name_)
1275  fSubtractFeeFromAmount = true;
1276  }
1277 
1278  CRecipient recipient = {scriptPubKey, nAmount, fSubtractFeeFromAmount};
1279  vecSend.push_back(recipient);
1280  }
1281 
1282  EnsureWalletIsUnlocked(pwallet);
1283 
1284  // Check funds
1285  if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && totalAmount > pwallet->GetLegacyBalance(ISMINE_SPENDABLE, nMinDepth, &strAccount)) {
1286  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, "Account has insufficient funds");
1287  } else if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && totalAmount > pwallet->GetLegacyBalance(ISMINE_SPENDABLE, nMinDepth, nullptr)) {
1288  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, "Wallet has insufficient funds");
1289  }
1290 
1291  // Shuffle recipient list
1292  std::shuffle(vecSend.begin(), vecSend.end(), FastRandomContext());
1293 
1294  // Send
1295  CReserveKey keyChange(pwallet);
1296  CAmount nFeeRequired = 0;
1297  int nChangePosRet = -1;
1298  std::string strFailReason;
1299  CTransactionRef tx;
1300  bool fCreated = pwallet->CreateTransaction(vecSend, tx, keyChange, nFeeRequired, nChangePosRet, strFailReason, coin_control);
1301  if (!fCreated)
1302  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, strFailReason);
1303  CValidationState state;
1304  if (!pwallet->CommitTransaction(tx, std::move(mapValue), {} /* orderForm */, std::move(strAccount), keyChange, g_connman.get(), state)) {
1305  strFailReason = strprintf("Transaction commit failed:: %s", FormatStateMessage(state));
1306  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, strFailReason);
1307  }
1308 
1309  return tx->GetHash().GetHex();
1310 }

1312 static UniValue addmultisigaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
1313 {
1314  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
1315  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
1316 
1317  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
1318  return NullUniValue;
1319  }
1320 
1321  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 2 || request.params.size() > 4) {
1322  std::string msg = "addmultisigaddress nrequired [\"key\",...] ( \"label\" \"address_type\" )\n"
1323  "\nAdd a nrequired-to-sign multisignature address to the wallet. Requires a new wallet backup.\n"
1324  "Each key is a Bitcoin address or hex-encoded public key.\n"
1325  "This functionality is only intended for use with non-watchonly addresses.\n"
1326  "See `importaddress` for watchonly p2sh address support.\n"
1327  "If 'label' is specified, assign address to that label.\n"
1328 
1329  "\nArguments:\n"
1330  "1. nrequired (numeric, required) The number of required signatures out of the n keys or addresses.\n"
1331  "2. \"keys\" (string, required) A json array of bitcoin addresses or hex-encoded public keys\n"
1332  " [\n"
1333  " \"address\" (string) bitcoin address or hex-encoded public key\n"
1334  " ...,\n"
1335  " ]\n"
1336  "3. \"label\" (string, optional) A label to assign the addresses to.\n"
1337  "4. \"address_type\" (string, optional) The address type to use. Options are \"legacy\", \"p2sh-segwit\", and \"bech32\". Default is set by -addresstype.\n"
1338 
1339  "\nResult:\n"
1340  "{\n"
1341  " \"address\":\"multisigaddress\", (string) The value of the new multisig address.\n"
1342  " \"redeemScript\":\"script\" (string) The string value of the hex-encoded redemption script.\n"
1343  "}\n"
1344  "\nExamples:\n"
1345  "\nAdd a multisig address from 2 addresses\n"
1346  + HelpExampleCli("addmultisigaddress", "2 \"[\\\"16sSauSf5pF2UkUwvKGq4qjNRzBZYqgEL5\\\",\\\"171sgjn4YtPu27adkKGrdDwzRTxnRkBfKV\\\"]\"") +
1347  "\nAs json rpc call\n"
1348  + HelpExampleRpc("addmultisigaddress", "2, \"[\\\"16sSauSf5pF2UkUwvKGq4qjNRzBZYqgEL5\\\",\\\"171sgjn4YtPu27adkKGrdDwzRTxnRkBfKV\\\"]\"")
1349  ;
1350  throw std::runtime_error(msg);
1351  }
1352 
1353  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
1354 
1355  std::string label;
1356  if (!request.params[2].isNull())
1357  label = LabelFromValue(request.params[2]);
1358 
1359  int required = request.params[0].get_int();
1360 
1361  // Get the public keys
1362  const UniValue& keys_or_addrs = request.params[1].get_array();
1363  std::vector<CPubKey> pubkeys;
1364  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < keys_or_addrs.size(); ++i) {
1365  if (IsHex(keys_or_addrs[i].get_str()) && (keys_or_addrs[i].get_str().length() == 66 || keys_or_addrs[i].get_str().length() == 130)) {
1366  pubkeys.push_back(HexToPubKey(keys_or_addrs[i].get_str()));
1367  } else {
1368  pubkeys.push_back(AddrToPubKey(pwallet, keys_or_addrs[i].get_str()));
1369  }
1370  }
1371 
1372  OutputType output_type = pwallet->m_default_address_type;
1373  if (!request.params[3].isNull()) {
1374  if (!ParseOutputType(request.params[3].get_str(), output_type)) {
1375  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, strprintf("Unknown address type '%s'", request.params[3].get_str()));
1376  }
1377  }
1378 
1379  // Construct using pay-to-script-hash:
1380  CScript inner = CreateMultisigRedeemscript(required, pubkeys);
1381  CTxDestination dest = AddAndGetDestinationForScript(*pwallet, inner, output_type);
1382  pwallet->SetAddressBook(dest, label, "send");
1383 
1384  UniValue result(UniValue::VOBJ);
1385  result.pushKV("address", EncodeDestination(dest));
1386  result.pushKV("redeemScript", HexStr(inner.begin(), inner.end()));
1387  return result;
1388 }
1389 
1390 class Witnessifier : public boost::static_visitor<bool>
1391 {
1392 public:
1393  CWallet * const pwallet;
1394  CTxDestination result;
1395  bool already_witness;
1396 
1397  explicit Witnessifier(CWallet *_pwallet) : pwallet(_pwallet), already_witness(false) {}
1398 
1399  bool operator()(const CKeyID &keyID) {
1400  if (pwallet) {
1401  CScript basescript = GetScriptForDestination(keyID);
1402  CScript witscript = GetScriptForWitness(basescript);
1403  if (!IsSolvable(*pwallet, witscript)) {
1404  return false;
1405  }
1406  return ExtractDestination(witscript, result);
1407  }
1408  return false;
1409  }
1410 
1411  bool operator()(const CScriptID &scriptID) {
1412  CScript subscript;
1413  if (pwallet && pwallet->GetCScript(scriptID, subscript)) {
1414  int witnessversion;
1415  std::vector<unsigned char> witprog;
1416  if (subscript.IsWitnessProgram(witnessversion, witprog)) {
1417  ExtractDestination(subscript, result);
1418  already_witness = true;
1419  return true;
1420  }
1421  CScript witscript = GetScriptForWitness(subscript);
1422  if (!IsSolvable(*pwallet, witscript)) {
1423  return false;
1424  }
1425  return ExtractDestination(witscript, result);
1426  }
1427  return false;
1428  }
1429 
1430  bool operator()(const WitnessV0KeyHash& id)
1431  {
1432  already_witness = true;
1433  result = id;
1434  return true;
1435  }
1436 
1437  bool operator()(const WitnessV0ScriptHash& id)
1438  {
1439  already_witness = true;
1440  result = id;
1441  return true;
1442  }
1443 
1444  template<typename T>
1445  bool operator()(const T& dest) { return false; }
1446 };
1447 
1448 static UniValue addwitnessaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
1449 {
1450  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
1451  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
1452 
1453  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
1454  return NullUniValue;
1455  }
1456 
1457  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() < 1 || request.params.size() > 2)
1458  {
1459  std::string msg = "addwitnessaddress \"address\" ( p2sh )\n"
1460  "\nDEPRECATED: set the address_type argument of getnewaddress, or option -addresstype=[bech32|p2sh-segwit] instead.\n"
1461  "Add a witness address for a script (with pubkey or redeemscript known). Requires a new wallet backup.\n"
1462  "It returns the witness script.\n"
1463 
1464  "\nArguments:\n"
1465  "1. \"address\" (string, required) An address known to the wallet\n"
1466  "2. p2sh (bool, optional, default=true) Embed inside P2SH\n"
1467 
1468  "\nResult:\n"
1469  "\"witnessaddress\", (string) The value of the new address (P2SH or BIP173).\n"
1470  "}\n"
1471  ;
1472  throw std::runtime_error(msg);
1473  }
1474 
1475  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("addwitnessaddress")) {
1476  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "addwitnessaddress is deprecated and will be fully removed in v0.17. "
1477  "To use addwitnessaddress in v0.16, restart bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=addwitnessaddress.\n"
1478  "Projects should transition to using the address_type argument of getnewaddress, or option -addresstype=[bech32|p2sh-segwit] instead.\n");
1479  }
1480 
1481  CTxDestination dest = DecodeDestination(request.params[0].get_str());
1482  if (!IsValidDestination(dest)) {
1483  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_ADDRESS_OR_KEY, "Invalid Bitcoin address");
1484  }
1485 
1486  bool p2sh = true;
1487  if (!request.params[1].isNull()) {
1488  p2sh = request.params[1].get_bool();
1489  }
1490 
1491  Witnessifier w(pwallet);
1492  bool ret = boost::apply_visitor(w, dest);
1493  if (!ret) {
1494  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "Public key or redeemscript not known to wallet, or the key is uncompressed");
1495  }
1496 
1497  CScript witprogram = GetScriptForDestination(w.result);
1498 
1499  if (p2sh) {
1500  w.result = CScriptID(witprogram);
1501  }
1502 
1503  if (w.already_witness) {
1504  if (!(dest == w.result)) {
1505  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "Cannot convert between witness address types");
1506  }
1507  } else {
1508  pwallet->AddCScript(witprogram); // Implicit for single-key now, but necessary for multisig and for compatibility with older software
1509  pwallet->SetAddressBook(w.result, "", "receive");
1510  }
1511 
1512  return EncodeDestination(w.result);
1513 }
1514 
1515 struct tallyitem
1516 {
1517  CAmount nAmount;
1518  int nConf;
1519  std::vector<uint256> txids;
1520  bool fIsWatchonly;
1521  tallyitem()
1522  {
1523  nAmount = 0;
1524  nConf = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
1525  fIsWatchonly = false;
1526  }
1527 };
1528 
1529 static UniValue ListReceived(CWallet * const pwallet, const UniValue& params, bool by_label)
1530 {
1531  // Minimum confirmations
1532  int nMinDepth = 1;
1533  if (!params[0].isNull())
1534  nMinDepth = params[0].get_int();
1535 
1536  // Whether to include empty labels
1537  bool fIncludeEmpty = false;
1538  if (!params[1].isNull())
1539  fIncludeEmpty = params[1].get_bool();
1540 
1541  isminefilter filter = ISMINE_SPENDABLE;
1542  if(!params[2].isNull())
1543  if(params[2].get_bool())
1544  filter = filter | ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY;
1545 
1546  bool has_filtered_address = false;
1547  CTxDestination filtered_address = CNoDestination();
1548  if (!by_label && params.size() > 3) {
1549  if (!IsValidDestinationString(params[3].get_str())) {
1550  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_WALLET_ERROR, "address_filter parameter was invalid");
1551  }
1552  filtered_address = DecodeDestination(params[3].get_str());
1553  has_filtered_address = true;
1554  }
1555 
1556  // Tally
1557  std::map<CTxDestination, tallyitem> mapTally;
1558  for (const std::pair<const uint256, CWalletTx>& pairWtx : pwallet->mapWallet) {
1559  const CWalletTx& wtx = pairWtx.second;
1560 
1561  if (wtx.IsCoinBase() || !CheckFinalTx(*wtx.tx))
1562  continue;
1563 
1564  int nDepth = wtx.GetDepthInMainChain();
1565  if (nDepth < nMinDepth)
1566  continue;
1567 
1568  for (const CTxOut& txout : wtx.tx->vout)
1569  {
1570  CTxDestination address;
1571  if (!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, address))
1572  continue;
1573 
1574  if (has_filtered_address && !(filtered_address == address)) {
1575  continue;
1576  }
1577 
1578  isminefilter mine = IsMine(*pwallet, address);
1579  if(!(mine & filter))
1580  continue;
1581 
1582  tallyitem& item = mapTally[address];
1583  item.nAmount += txout.nValue;
1584  item.nConf = std::min(item.nConf, nDepth);
1585  item.txids.push_back(wtx.GetHash());
1586  if (mine & ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY)
1587  item.fIsWatchonly = true;
1588  }
1589  }
1590 
1591  // Reply
1592  UniValue ret(UniValue::VARR);
1593  std::map<std::string, tallyitem> label_tally;
1594 
1595  // Create mapAddressBook iterator
1596  // If we aren't filtering, go from begin() to end()
1597  auto start = pwallet->mapAddressBook.begin();
1598  auto end = pwallet->mapAddressBook.end();
1599  // If we are filtering, find() the applicable entry
1600  if (has_filtered_address) {
1601  start = pwallet->mapAddressBook.find(filtered_address);
1602  if (start != end) {
1603  end = std::next(start);
1604  }
1605  }
1606 
1607  for (auto item_it = start; item_it != end; ++item_it)
1608  {
1609  const CTxDestination& address = item_it->first;
1610  const std::string& label = item_it->second.name;
1611  auto it = mapTally.find(address);
1612  if (it == mapTally.end() && !fIncludeEmpty)
1613  continue;
1614 
1615  CAmount nAmount = 0;
1616  int nConf = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
1617  bool fIsWatchonly = false;
1618  if (it != mapTally.end())
1619  {
1620  nAmount = (*it).second.nAmount;
1621  nConf = (*it).second.nConf;
1622  fIsWatchonly = (*it).second.fIsWatchonly;
1623  }
1624 
1625  if (by_label)
1626  {
1627  tallyitem& _item = label_tally[label];
1628  _item.nAmount += nAmount;
1629  _item.nConf = std::min(_item.nConf, nConf);
1630  _item.fIsWatchonly = fIsWatchonly;
1631  }
1632  else
1633  {
1634  UniValue obj(UniValue::VOBJ);
1635  if(fIsWatchonly)
1636  obj.pushKV("involvesWatchonly", true);
1637  obj.pushKV("address", EncodeDestination(address));
1638  obj.pushKV("account", label);
1639  obj.pushKV("amount", ValueFromAmount(nAmount));
1640  obj.pushKV("confirmations", (nConf == std::numeric_limits<int>::max() ? 0 : nConf));
1641  obj.pushKV("label", label);
1642  UniValue transactions(UniValue::VARR);
1643  if (it != mapTally.end())
1644  {
1645  for (const uint256& _item : (*it).second.txids)
1646  {
1647  transactions.push_back(_item.GetHex());
1648  }
1649  }
1650  obj.pushKV("txids", transactions);
1651  ret.push_back(obj);
1652  }
1653  }
1654 
1655  if (by_label)
1656  {
1657  for (const auto& entry : label_tally)
1658  {
1659  CAmount nAmount = entry.second.nAmount;
1660  int nConf = entry.second.nConf;
1661  UniValue obj(UniValue::VOBJ);
1662  if (entry.second.fIsWatchonly)
1663  obj.pushKV("involvesWatchonly", true);
1664  obj.pushKV("account", entry.first);
1665  obj.pushKV("amount", ValueFromAmount(nAmount));
1666  obj.pushKV("confirmations", (nConf == std::numeric_limits<int>::max() ? 0 : nConf));
1667  obj.pushKV("label", entry.first);
1668  ret.push_back(obj);
1669  }
1670  }
1671 
1672  return ret;
1673 }
1674 
1675 static UniValue listreceivedbyaddress(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
1676 {
1677  std::shared_ptr<CWallet> const wallet = GetWalletForJSONRPCRequest(request);
1678  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
1679 
1680  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
1681  return NullUniValue;
1682  }
1683 
1684  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() > 4)
1685  throw std::runtime_error(
1686  "listreceivedbyaddress ( minconf include_empty include_watchonly address_filter )\n"
1687  "\nList balances by receiving address.\n"
1688  "\nArguments:\n"
1689  "1. minconf (numeric, optional, default=1) The minimum number of confirmations before payments are included.\n"
1690  "2. include_empty (bool, optional, default=false) Whether to include addresses that haven't received any payments.\n"
1691  "3. include_watchonly (bool, optional, default=false) Whether to include watch-only addresses (see 'importaddress').\n"
1692  "4. address_filter (string, optional) If present, only return information on this address.\n"
1693  "\nResult:\n"
1694  "[\n"
1695  " {\n"
1696  " \"involvesWatchonly\" : true, (bool) Only returned if imported addresses were involved in transaction\n"
1697  " \"address\" : \"receivingaddress\", (string) The receiving address\n"
1698  " \"account\" : \"accountname\", (string) DEPRECATED. Backwards compatible alias for label.\n"
1699  " \"amount\" : x.xxx, (numeric) The total amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " received by the address\n"
1700  " \"confirmations\" : n, (numeric) The number of confirmations of the most recent transaction included\n"
1701  " \"label\" : \"label\", (string) The label of the receiving address. The default label is \"\".\n"
1702  " \"txids\": [\n"
1703  " \"txid\", (string) The ids of transactions received with the address \n"
1704  " ...\n"
1705  " ]\n"
1706  " }\n"
1707  " ,...\n"
1708  "]\n"
1709 
1710  "\nExamples:\n"
1711  + HelpExampleCli("listreceivedbyaddress", "")
1712  + HelpExampleCli("listreceivedbyaddress", "6 true")
1713  + HelpExampleRpc("listreceivedbyaddress", "6, true, true")
1714  + HelpExampleRpc("listreceivedbyaddress", "6, true, true, \"1M72Sfpbz1BPpXFHz9m3CdqATR44Jvaydd\"")
1715  );
1716 
1717  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
1718  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
1719  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
1720 
1721  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
1722 
1723  return ListReceived(pwallet, request.params, false);
1724 }

1778 static void MaybePushAddress(UniValue & entry, const CTxDestination &dest)
1779 {

1782  }

1796 static void ListTransactions(CWallet* const pwallet, const CWalletTx& wtx, const std::string& strAccount, int nMinDepth, bool fLong, UniValue& ret, const isminefilter& filter)
1797 {
1798  CAmount nFee;
1799  std::string strSentAccount;
1800  std::list<COutputEntry> listReceived;
1801  std::list<COutputEntry> listSent;
1802 
1803  wtx.GetAmounts(listReceived, listSent, nFee, strSentAccount, filter);
1804 
1805  bool fAllAccounts = (strAccount == std::string("*"));
1806  bool involvesWatchonly = wtx.IsFromMe(ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY);
1807 
1808  // Sent
1809  if ((!listSent.empty() || nFee != 0) && (fAllAccounts || strAccount == strSentAccount))
1810  {
1811  for (const COutputEntry& s : listSent)
1812  {
1813  UniValue entry(UniValue::VOBJ);
1814  if (involvesWatchonly || (::IsMine(*pwallet, s.destination) & ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY)) {
1815  entry.pushKV("involvesWatchonly", true);
1816  }
1817  if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) entry.pushKV("account", strSentAccount);
1818  MaybePushAddress(entry, s.destination);
1819  entry.pushKV("category", "send");
1820  entry.pushKV("amount", ValueFromAmount(-s.amount));
1821  if (pwallet->mapAddressBook.count(s.destination)) {
1822  entry.pushKV("label", pwallet->mapAddressBook[s.destination].name);
1823  }
1824  entry.pushKV("vout", s.vout);
1825  entry.pushKV("fee", ValueFromAmount(-nFee));
1826  if (fLong)
1827  WalletTxToJSON(wtx, entry);
1828  entry.pushKV("abandoned", wtx.isAbandoned());
1829  ret.push_back(entry);
1830  }
1831  }
1832 
1833  // Received
1834  if (listReceived.size() > 0 && wtx.GetDepthInMainChain() >= nMinDepth)
1835  {
1836  for (const COutputEntry& r : listReceived)
1837  {
1838  std::string account;
1839  if (pwallet->mapAddressBook.count(r.destination)) {
1840  account = pwallet->mapAddressBook[r.destination].name;
1841  }
1842  if (fAllAccounts || (account == strAccount))
1843  {
1844  UniValue entry(UniValue::VOBJ);
1845  if (involvesWatchonly || (::IsMine(*pwallet, r.destination) & ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY)) {
1846  entry.pushKV("involvesWatchonly", true);
1847  }
1848  if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) entry.pushKV("account", account);
1849  MaybePushAddress(entry, r.destination);
1850  if (wtx.IsCoinBase())
1851  {
1852  if (wtx.GetDepthInMainChain() < 1)
1853  entry.pushKV("category", "orphan");
1854  else if (wtx.GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
1855  entry.pushKV("category", "immature");
1856  else
1857  entry.pushKV("category", "generate");
1858  }
1859  else
1860  {
1861  entry.pushKV("category", "receive");
1862  }
1863  entry.pushKV("amount", ValueFromAmount(r.amount));
1864  if (pwallet->mapAddressBook.count(r.destination)) {
1865  entry.pushKV("label", account);
1866  }
1867  entry.pushKV("vout", r.vout);
1868  if (fLong)
1869  WalletTxToJSON(wtx, entry);
1870  ret.push_back(entry);
1871  }
1872  }
1873  }
1874 }
1875 
1876 static void AcentryToJSON(const CAccountingEntry& acentry, const std::string& strAccount, UniValue& ret)
1877 {
1878  bool fAllAccounts = (strAccount == std::string("*"));
1879 
1880  if (fAllAccounts || acentry.strAccount == strAccount)
1881  {
1882  UniValue entry(UniValue::VOBJ);
1883  entry.pushKV("account", acentry.strAccount);
1884  entry.pushKV("category", "move");
1885  entry.pushKV("time", acentry.nTime);
1886  entry.pushKV("amount", ValueFromAmount(acentry.nCreditDebit));
1887  if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) entry.pushKV("otheraccount", acentry.strOtherAccount);
1888  entry.pushKV("comment", acentry.strComment);
1889  ret.push_back(entry);
1890  }
1891 }

1893 UniValue listtransactions(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
1894 {

1896  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
1897 
1898  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
1899  return NullUniValue;
1900  }
1901 
1902  std::string help_text {};
1903  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
1904  help_text = "listtransactions (dummy count skip include_watchonly)\n"
1905  "\nReturns up to 'count' most recent transactions skipping the first 'from' transactions for account 'account'.\n"

1917  " \"category\":\"send|receive\", (string) The transaction category.\n"

1921  " \"vout\": n, (numeric) the vout value\n"

1924  " \"confirmations\": n, (numeric) The number of confirmations for the transaction. Negative confirmations indicate the\n"
1925  " transaction conflicts with the block chain\n"
1926  " \"trusted\": xxx, (bool) Whether we consider the outputs of this unconfirmed transaction safe to spend.\n"
1927  " \"blockhash\": \"hashvalue\", (string) The block hash containing the transaction.\n"
1928  " \"blockindex\": n, (numeric) The index of the transaction in the block that includes it.\n"
1929  " \"blocktime\": xxx, (numeric) The block time in seconds since epoch (1 Jan 1970 GMT).\n"
1930  " \"txid\": \"transactionid\", (string) The transaction id.\n"
1931  " \"time\": xxx, (numeric) The transaction time in seconds since epoch (midnight Jan 1 1970 GMT).\n"
1932  " \"timereceived\": xxx, (numeric) The time received in seconds since epoch (midnight Jan 1 1970 GMT).\n"
1933  " \"comment\": \"...\", (string) If a comment is associated with the transaction.\n"
1934  " \"bip125-replaceable\": \"yes|no|unknown\", (string) Whether this transaction could be replaced due to BIP125 (replace-by-fee);\n"
1935  " may be unknown for unconfirmed transactions not in the mempool\n"
1936  " \"abandoned\": xxx (bool) 'true' if the transaction has been abandoned (inputs are respendable). Only available for the \n"
1937  " 'send' category of transactions.\n"
1938  " }\n"
1939  "]\n"
1940 
1941  "\nExamples:\n"
1942  "\nList the most recent 10 transactions in the systems\n"
1943  + HelpExampleCli("listtransactions", "") +
1944  "\nList transactions 100 to 120\n"
1945  + HelpExampleCli("listtransactions", "\"*\" 20 100") +
1946  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
1947  + HelpExampleRpc("listtransactions", "\"*\", 20, 100");
1948  } else {
1949  help_text = "listtransactions ( \"account\" count skip include_watchonly)\n"
1950  "\nReturns up to 'count' most recent transactions skipping the first 'from' transactions for account 'account'.\n"
1951  "\nArguments:\n"
1952  "1. \"account\" (string, optional) DEPRECATED. This argument will be removed in V0.18. The account name. Should be \"*\".\n"
1953  "2. count (numeric, optional, default=10) The number of transactions to return\n"
1954  "3. skip (numeric, optional, default=0) The number of transactions to skip\n"
1955  "4. include_watchonly (bool, optional, default=false) Include transactions to watch-only addresses (see 'importaddress')\n"
1956  "\nResult:\n"
1957  "[\n"
1958  " {\n"
1959  " \"account\":\"accountname\", (string) DEPRECATED. This field will be removed in V0.18. The account name associated with the transaction. \n"
1960  " It will be \"\" for the default account.\n"
1961  " \"address\":\"address\", (string) The bitcoin address of the transaction. Not present for \n"
1962  " move transactions (category = move).\n"
1963  " \"category\":\"send|receive|move\", (string) The transaction category. 'move' is a local (off blockchain)\n"
1964  " transaction between accounts, and not associated with an address,\n"
1965  " transaction id or block. 'send' and 'receive' transactions are \n"
1966  " associated with an address, transaction id and block details\n"
1967  " \"amount\": x.xxx, (numeric) The amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + ". This is negative for the 'send' category, and for the\n"
1968  " 'move' category for moves outbound. It is positive for the 'receive' category,\n"
1969  " and for the 'move' category for inbound funds.\n"
1970  " \"label\": \"label\", (string) A comment for the address/transaction, if any\n"
1971  " \"vout\": n, (numeric) the vout value\n"
1972  " \"fee\": x.xxx, (numeric) The amount of the fee in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + ". This is negative and only available for the \n"
1973  " 'send' category of transactions.\n"
1974  " \"confirmations\": n, (numeric) The number of confirmations for the transaction. Available for 'send' and \n"
1975  " 'receive' category of transactions. Negative confirmations indicate the\n"
1976  " transaction conflicts with the block chain\n"
1977  " \"trusted\": xxx, (bool) Whether we consider the outputs of this unconfirmed transaction safe to spend.\n"
1978  " \"blockhash\": \"hashvalue\", (string) The block hash containing the transaction. Available for 'send' and 'receive'\n"
1979  " category of transactions.\n"
1980  " \"blockindex\": n, (numeric) The index of the transaction in the block that includes it. Available for 'send' and 'receive'\n"
1981  " category of transactions.\n"
1982  " \"blocktime\": xxx, (numeric) The block time in seconds since epoch (1 Jan 1970 GMT).\n"
1983  " \"txid\": \"transactionid\", (string) The transaction id. Available for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.\n"
1984  " \"time\": xxx, (numeric) The transaction time in seconds since epoch (midnight Jan 1 1970 GMT).\n"
1985  " \"timereceived\": xxx, (numeric) The time received in seconds since epoch (midnight Jan 1 1970 GMT). Available \n"
1986  " for 'send' and 'receive' category of transactions.\n"

1988  " \"otheraccount\": \"accountname\", (string) DEPRECATED. This field will be removed in V0.18. For the 'move' category of transactions, the account the funds came \n"
1989  " from (for receiving funds, positive amounts), or went to (for sending funds,\n"
1990  " negative amounts).\n"
1991  " \"bip125-replaceable\": \"yes|no|unknown\", (string) Whether this transaction could be replaced due to BIP125 (replace-by-fee);\n"
1992  " may be unknown for unconfirmed transactions not in the mempool\n"
1993  " \"abandoned\": xxx (bool) 'true' if the transaction has been abandoned (inputs are respendable). Only available for the \n"
1994  " 'send' category of transactions.\n"
1995  " }\n"
1996  "]\n"
1997 
1998  "\nExamples:\n"
1999  "\nList the most recent 10 transactions in the systems\n"
2000  + HelpExampleCli("listtransactions", "") +
2001  "\nList transactions 100 to 120\n"
2002  + HelpExampleCli("listtransactions", "\"*\" 20 100") +
2003  "\nAs a json rpc call\n"
2004  + HelpExampleRpc("listtransactions", "\"*\", 20, 100");
2005  }
2006  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() > 4) throw std::runtime_error(help_text);
2007 
2008  // Make sure the results are valid at least up to the most recent block
2009  // the user could have gotten from another RPC command prior to now
2010  pwallet->BlockUntilSyncedToCurrentChain();
2011 
2012  std::string strAccount = "*";
2013  if (!request.params[0].isNull()) {
2014  strAccount = request.params[0].get_str();
2015  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts") && strAccount != "*") {
2016  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Dummy value must be set to \"*\"");
2017  }
2018  }
2019  int nCount = 10;
2020  if (!request.params[1].isNull())
2021  nCount = request.params[1].get_int();
2022  int nFrom = 0;
2023  if (!request.params[2].isNull())
2024  nFrom = request.params[2].get_int();
2025  isminefilter filter = ISMINE_SPENDABLE;
2026  if(!request.params[3].isNull())
2027  if(request.params[3].get_bool())
2028  filter = filter | ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY;
2029 
2030  if (nCount < 0)
2031  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Negative count");
2032  if (nFrom < 0)
2033  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_INVALID_PARAMETER, "Negative from");
2034 
2035  UniValue ret(UniValue::VARR);
2036 
2037  {
2038  LOCK2(cs_main, pwallet->cs_wallet);
2039 
2040  const CWallet::TxItems & txOrdered = pwallet->wtxOrdered;
2041 
2042  // iterate backwards until we have nCount items to return:
2043  for (CWallet::TxItems::const_reverse_iterator it = txOrdered.rbegin(); it != txOrdered.rend(); ++it)
2044  {
2045  CWalletTx *const pwtx = (*it).second.first;
2046  if (pwtx != nullptr)
2047  ListTransactions(pwallet, *pwtx, strAccount, 0, true, ret, filter);
2048  if (IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
2049  CAccountingEntry *const pacentry = (*it).second.second;
2050  if (pacentry != nullptr) AcentryToJSON(*pacentry, strAccount, ret);
2051  }
2052 
2053  if ((int)ret.size() >= (nCount+nFrom)) break;
2054  }
2055  }
2056 
2057  // ret is newest to oldest
2058 
2059  if (nFrom > (int)ret.size())
2060  nFrom = ret.size();
2061  if ((nFrom + nCount) > (int)ret.size())
2062  nCount = ret.size() - nFrom;
2063 
2064  std::vector<UniValue> arrTmp = ret.getValues();
2065 
2066  std::vector<UniValue>::iterator first = arrTmp.begin();
2067  std::advance(first, nFrom);
2068  std::vector<UniValue>::iterator last = arrTmp.begin();
2069  std::advance(last, nFrom+nCount);
2070 
2071  if (last != arrTmp.end()) arrTmp.erase(last, arrTmp.end());
2072  if (first != arrTmp.begin()) arrTmp.erase(arrTmp.begin(), first);
2073 
2074  std::reverse(arrTmp.begin(), arrTmp.end()); // Return oldest to newest
2075 
2076  ret.clear();
2077  ret.setArray();
2078  ret.push_backV(arrTmp);
2079 
2080  return ret;
2081 }

2083 static UniValue listaccounts(const JSONRPCRequest& request)
2084 {

2086  CWallet* const pwallet = wallet.get();
2087 
2088  if (!EnsureWalletIsAvailable(pwallet, request.fHelp)) {
2089  return NullUniValue;
2090  }
2091 
2092  if (!IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled("accounts")) {
2093  if (request.fHelp) {
2094  throw std::runtime_error("listaccounts (Deprecated, will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts)");
2095  }
2096  throw JSONRPCError(RPC_METHOD_DEPRECATED, "listaccounts is deprecated and will be removed in V0.18. To use this command, start bitcoind with -deprecatedrpc=accounts.");
2097  }
2098 
2099  if (request.fHelp || request.params.size() > 2)
2100  throw std::runtime_error(
2101  "listaccounts ( minconf include_watchonly)\n"
2102  "\nDEPRECATED. Returns Object that has account names as keys, account balances as values.\n"
2103  "\nArguments:\n"
2104  "1. minconf (numeric, optional, default=1) Only include transactions with at least this many confirmations\n"

2106  "\nResult:\n"
2107  "{ (json object where keys are account names, and values are numeric balances\n"
