4664  " [\n"
4665  " {\n"
4666  " \"address\": x.xxx, (obj, optional) A key-value pair. The key (string) is the bitcoin address, the value (float or string) is the amount in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + "\n"
4667  " },\n"
4668  " {\n"
4669  " \"data\": \"hex\" (obj, optional) A key-value pair. The key must be \"data\", the value is hex encoded data\n"
4670  " }\n"
4671  " ,... More key-value pairs of the above form. For compatibility reasons, a dictionary, which holds the key-value pairs directly, is also\n"
4672  " accepted as second parameter.\n"
4673  " ]\n"
4674  "3. locktime (numeric, optional, default=0) Raw locktime. Non-0 value also locktime-activates inputs\n"
4675  "4. replaceable (boolean, optional, default=false) Marks this transaction as BIP125 replaceable.\n"
4676  " Allows this transaction to be replaced by a transaction with higher fees. If provided, it is an error if explicit sequence numbers are incompatible.\n"
4677  "5. options (object, optional)\n"
4678  " {\n"
4679  " \"changeAddress\" (string, optional, default pool address) The bitcoin address to receive the change\n"
4680  " \"changePosition\" (numeric, optional, default random) The index of the change output\n"
4681  " \"change_type\" (string, optional) The output type to use. Only valid if changeAddress is not specified. Options are \"legacy\", \"p2sh-segwit\", and \"bech32\". Default is set by -changetype.\n"
4682  " \"includeWatching\" (boolean, optional, default false) Also select inputs which are watch only\n"
4683  " \"lockUnspents\" (boolean, optional, default false) Lock selected unspent outputs\n"
4684  " \"feeRate\" (numeric, optional, default not set: makes wallet determine the fee) Set a specific fee rate in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + "/kB\n"
4685  " \"subtractFeeFromOutputs\" (array, optional) A json array of integers.\n"
4686  " The fee will be equally deducted from the amount of each specified output.\n"
4687  " The outputs are specified by their zero-based index, before any change output is added.\n"
4688  " Those recipients will receive less bitcoins than you enter in their corresponding amount field.\n"
4689  " If no outputs are specified here, the sender pays the fee.\n"
4690  " [vout_index,...]\n"
4691  " \"replaceable\" (boolean, optional) Marks this transaction as BIP125 replaceable.\n"
4692  " Allows this transaction to be replaced by a transaction with higher fees\n"
4693  " \"conf_target\" (numeric, optional) Confirmation target (in blocks)\n"
4694  " \"estimate_mode\" (string, optional, default=UNSET) The fee estimate mode, must be one of:\n"
4695  " \"UNSET\"\n"
4696  " \"ECONOMICAL\"\n"
4697  " \"CONSERVATIVE\"\n"
4698  " }\n"
4699  "6. bip32derivs (boolean, optiona, default=false) If true, includes the BIP 32 derivation paths for public keys if we know them\n"
4700  "\nResult:\n"
4701  "{\n"
4702  " \"psbt\": \"value\", (string) The resulting raw transaction (base64-encoded string)\n"
4703  " \"fee\": n, (numeric) Fee in " + CURRENCY_UNIT + " the resulting transaction pays\n"
4704  " \"changepos\": n (numeric) The position of the added change output, or -1\n"
4705  "}\n"
4706  "\nExamples:\n"
4707  "\nCreate a transaction with no inputs\n"
4708  + HelpExampleCli("walletcreatefundedpsbt", "\"[{\\\"txid\\\":\\\"myid\\\",\\\"vout\\\":0}]\" \"[{\\\"data\\\":\\\"00010203\\\"}]\"")
4709  );
4710 
4711  RPCTypeCheck(request.params, {
4712  UniValue::VARR,
4713  UniValueType(), // ARR or OBJ, checked later
4714  UniValue::VNUM,
4715  UniValue::VBOOL,
4716  UniValue::VOBJ
4717  }, true
4718  );
4719 
4720  CAmount fee;
4721  int change_position;
4722  CMutableTransaction rawTx = ConstructTransaction(request.params[0], request.params[1], request.params[2], request.params[3]);
4723  FundTransaction(pwallet, rawTx, fee, change_position, request.params[4]);
4724 
4725  // Make a blank psbt
4726  PartiallySignedTransaction psbtx;
4727  psbtx.tx = rawTx;
4728  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rawTx.vin.size(); ++i) {
4729  psbtx.inputs.push_back(PSBTInput());
4730  }
4731  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rawTx.vout.size(); ++i) {
4732  psbtx.outputs.push_back(PSBTOutput());
4733  }
4734 
4735  // Use CTransaction for the constant parts of the
4736  // transaction to avoid rehashing.
4737  const CTransaction txConst(*psbtx.tx);
4738 
4739  // Fill transaction with out data but don't sign
4740  bool bip32derivs = request.params[5].isNull() ? false : request.params[5].get_bool();
4741  FillPSBT(pwallet, psbtx, &txConst, 1, false, bip32derivs);
4742 
4743  // Serialize the PSBT
4744  CDataStream ssTx(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
4745  ssTx << psbtx;
4746 
4747  UniValue result(UniValue::VOBJ);
4748  result.pushKV("psbt", EncodeBase64((unsigned char*)ssTx.data(), ssTx.size()));
4749  result.pushKV("fee", ValueFromAmount(fee));
4750  result.pushKV("changepos", change_position);
4751  return result;
4752 }
